name: Constant Clicker
description:
A colourful cast of circles await you in a high score clicker game where the aim is to click before time runs out! Currently the game contains 3 modes;

  • Default

The normal experience, nothing to get in the way!

  • False

2 similarly coloured fake circles are added for extra challenge!

  • Wanted

The same as False but the fake circles are never removed!

In addition to this you can configure the time [In Frames] to your pleasing! Options include;

  • 30 Frames (Impossible)
  • 60 Frames (Hard)
  • 90 Frames (Normal)
  • 120 Frames (Easy)
  • 150 Frames (Very Easy)
  • 180 Frames (Easiest)
  • Infinity

There is even an option to enable a highlight around your cursor to show when you can click on something!
